Lachlan Donald

Computer geek, coffee snob and cat lover. I’m CTO over at 99designs, living in San Francisco.

When I’m not exploring the world with my wife, Sarah, I’m building incredible web products and working with great teams of developers. I’m especially interested in scaling web applications and the business processes for creating them, cloud infrastructure, virtualization, distributed systems and test-driven development.
